WorkItem.Description:
Described in thread:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=66865
----
 
It turns out that this is due to a bug in TCPDF (the underlying package used by PHPExcel)
https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?func=detail&aid=2848892&group_id=128076&atid=710532
 
Since the bug has been fixed in TCPDF 4.7.003, upgrading PHPExcel to incorporate that class should fix the problem.
WorkItem.Summary: Gaps between rows in output by PHPExcel_Writer_PDF
